content: complimentary pattern sarasota scarf design by nancy ekvall 14 colors of woolstok light colors shown experience level - beginner materials - woolstok light 100% fine highland wool 50g/218 yds 3 hanks of no 2304 grey harbor and approx 66 of each of the following no 2300 cast iron no 2301 storm cloud no 2303 highland fleece no 2305 october sky no 2306 wild thyme no 2308 golden meadow no 2309 earth ivy no 2311 rusted roof no 2314 deep velvet no 2315 red rock no 2316 spun gold no 2317 midnight sea and no 2320 spring ice colors shown in photos - size 8 5mm needles or size needed to obtain gauge - tapestry needle size - one finished measurements - length 84 - width 9½ gauge - in stockinette 21 sts and 28 row = 4 abbreviations sarasota scarf no 202222 bobble bind off design by nancy ekvall pattern co cast on k knit knit on larger needles to keep your scarf light and airy this kfb knit into the front and back of stitch beginner piece is ideal for using up your woolstok light k2tog knit 2 stitches together scraps to play with pops of color p purl repeat repeat rs right side st s stitch es ws wrong side * repeat the directions between the asterisks as many times as indicated blue sky fibers complimentary pattern notes all color stripes are worked on the ws purl row this piece was created using 1 stripe each of 13 colors placing stripes randomly throughout the piece approximately 4 to 8 inches apart more stripes can be added as desired ideal piece for using up your leftover colors from previous projects scarf with no 2304 grey harbor co 70 sts row 1 rs kfb k to last 2 sts k2tog row 2 ws p repeat last 2 row until piece meas 84 or to desired length adding 1 stripe of color randomly throughout the scarf on ws row bobble loosely finishing weave in ends as this piece is knit on larger needles to create a loose gauge steaming is recommended for finishing care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store folded do not hang p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2022 this pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 05012022
